app.name: Controlling a LED from Secure TCP Server Template
app.category: Applied Embedded Systems Lab by AIC and BiiL
app.description: This template show how to control a LED on TCP client from secure TCP server.

app.name: Sending Button Event via MQTT and MQTTs Template
app.category: Applied Embedded Systems Lab by AIC and BiiL
app.description: This template show how to send a button event via MQTT and MQTTs client.
